unnormalised: Just in! The much-awaited Durga Puja celebrations in Kolkata are slated to begin on 10/10/2024. Expect pandals to start popping up a week or so before that, though. Book your train tickets ASAP, folks, because 2nd AC seats are already getting booked up!
normalised: Just in! The much awaited Durga Puja celebrations in Kolkata are slated to begin on tenth October two thousand and twenty four. Expect pandals to start popping up a week or so before that, though. Book your train tickets A-S-A-P, folks, because second A-C seats are already getting booked up!

unnormalised: And for all you Diwali enthusiasts, mark your calendars – Diwali falls on 31/10/2024 this year. Time to start planning those card parties and figuring out what sweets to order from Haldiram's, isn't it? Remember to prepone your Diwali cleaning plans - don't leave it till the last minute!
normalised: And for all you Diwali enthusiasts, mark your calendars – Diwali falls on thirty first October two thousand and twenty four this year. Time to start planning those card parties and figuring out what sweets to order from Haldiram's, isn't it? Remember to prepone your Diwali cleaning plans - don't leave it till the last minute!

unnormalised: Of course, let’s not forget Christmas. 25/12/2024 is a Wednesday, so many folks are already planning extended holidays to Goa. Watch out for those flight prices though - they usually skyrocket around that time. Pre-booking is key to saving some ₹₹.
normalised: Of course, let’s not forget Christmas. twenty fifth December two thousand and twenty four is a Wednesday, so many folks are already planning extended holidays to Goa. Watch out for those flight prices though - they usually skyrocket around that time. Pre booking is key to saving some rupees.

unnormalised: And finally, for those already looking ahead – Holi is on 17/03/2025! Start stocking up on those colours and water balloons well in advance, and get ready for some serious fun. Plus, remember to apply coconut oil to your hair before, so the colours don't stick too hard!
normalised: And finally, for those already looking ahead – Holi is on seventeenth March two thousand and twenty five! Start stocking up on those colors and water balloons well in advance, and get ready for some serious fun. Plus, remember to apply coconut oil to your hair before, so the colors don't stick too hard!
